topics.body:
Alright, today is the fateful day.
I will be taking my examination results, choose my future university and major, and be awesome while doing it.
If I'm silent, that means I am crying my eyeballs out.
For what reason is up to you.

God, I feel scared.

topics.body:
So I have watched 22 episodes of Cardcaptor Sakura and nothing resembling a plot has shown up yet. So far it's been
>Sakura does a thing
>Oh shit a Clow Card
>Sakura catches the card.
I mean it's not BAD, I just wish something would happen.
